Text: Status of invoicesJim I was hoping that you could give me a status update on the outstanding invoices from PJM to the two Enron subs It was my understanding that you were going to be discussing them with the day committee today Given the ramifications of a default some of which we spoke of this morning I would like to stay as uptodate as possible with Enrons plans and intentions Thank you very much Chris Hein
Enron DecisionJim Could you tell what Enron has decided to do regarding the outstanding invoices Thanks Chris
